title: Art Director / Manager
content: Aaronline Design was my own one-stop boutique art studio offering hi-resolution product photography, Giclee printing, print design and web design
Financial Management and Client Liaison
Management of productivity software including Adobe Creative Suite, QuarkXPress, various web design applications
Digital SLR Photography and Photo Retouching

title: Front End Web Developer / Designer
content: Design, develop, maintain and deploy websites for BCE schools, BCE office and entities
Wireframing, web design, programming, development and maintenance of school websites
Database design, development and administration
Provide SharePoint public website administration training and online intranet documentation
Graphic design and digital SLR photography
Help desk support for school administrators and BCE staff through ServiceNow platform.

title: Web Production Coordinator
content: Managed content across DAF's corporate and franchise websites using the Squiz Matrix CMS, ensuring consistent brand presentation and site reliability
Built campaign sites on the Squiz platform in alignment with the Queensland Government Design System v.2 framework, while guaranteeing compliance with WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards
Developed web forms for routine corporate processes—such as enquiries and disaster declarations—using the Form.io platform to streamline user interactions and data collection.

company: Department of Energy and Public Works
title: Web Production Coordinator
content: Managed content across EPW's corporate and franchise websites using SharePoint and Squiz Matrix CMS, ensuring consistent brand presentation and site reliability
Built campaign sites on the Squiz platform in alignment with the Queensland Government Design System v.2 framework, while guaranteeing compliance with WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards
Deliver analytics on website interactions and build dashboards in Looker Studio.

title: Online Content Design Officer
content: Collaborated with the broader communications team to plan, design, and develop digital and web solutions aligned with QT's strategic goals

Employed web development tools and content management systems (e.g., WordPress and Squiz), plus coding languages such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create and optimize engaging, client-focused online experiences
Applied expertise in client web journey design—including wireframing, UX, and mobile responsiveness—to deliver user-centered, accessible digital solutions
Leveraged data and analytics tools to inform, monitor, and evaluate the performance of online resources; provided recommendations for enhancements to achieve strategic outcomes.
